assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Given the retrospective nature of the study, approval by Ethic Committee was not required. Informed consent to genetic analysis on peripheral blood, tissue biopsy, or other samples was obtained by parents of participants and archived by authors according to the local ethic committee’s policy. Individual data included in this paper have been de-identified and presented in aggregate. The study was conducted in accordance with the ethical principles enshrined in the Helsinki Declaration.
